amendment.description: To require the Comptroller General of the United States conduct a study and report on the effectiveness of authorities relating to the safety of imported consumer products.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4114 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4114 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Obama. (consideration: CR S1693-1696; text: CR S1695-1696) To require the Comptroller General of the United States conduct a study and report on the effectiveness of authorities relating to the safety of imported consumer products.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4114 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4114 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Obama.
